author: Ylan Mui
title: I survived coronavirus. There's no road map for what comes next
description: As the nation's leaders contemplate how to reopen the economy, survivors of the virus could hold the key, but there's no road map for recovery.
content:
CNBC Reporter Ylan Mui with her kids.
The letter that arrived in my mailbox from the local public health department sounded definitive:
"This person has been cleared to return to normal activities without restrictions," it read.
I received it three weeks a… [+7368 chars]
